title: I use pixel 3a XL . Is it possible to switch and use data from both physical and esim?? Or the data
content: Is it possible to use data from both the physical and esim in pixel or is it fixed and default in what we assign and can't be changed ?? Kindly help. I have assigned in esim and when try tk switch ON the data from physical it says esim data won't be Turned ON in future. Need advice
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
